tool_description: API where developers can access the latest Blockchain Dev Codes
name: Boiler Plate Wiki
title: Boiler Plate Wiki

api_list.name: BoilerPlate for Blockchain Developers
api_list.description: Where developers can get latest dev codes for blockchain
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://boiler-plate-wiki.p.rapidapi.com/instructions/solana"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "boiler-plate-wiki.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://boiler-plate-wiki.p.rapidapi.com/instructions/{blockchainid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "boiler-plate-wiki.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
